#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstdio>
long long int gcd(long long int,long long int);
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long long int xs,ys,xd,yd;
    long long int i,j,z;
   int n;
   scanf("%d",&n);
   while(n--)
   {
       scanf("%lld %lld %lld %lld",&xs,&ys,&xd,&yd);
       if(xs<0)
       xs=-xs;
       if(ys<0)
       ys=-ys;
       if(xd<0)
       xd=-xd;
       if(yd<0)
       yd=-yd;

       i=gcd(xs,ys);
       j=gcd(xd,yd);
        if(i==0)
       {
           if(j==0)
           printf("YES\n");
           else
           printf("NO\n");
           continue;
       }
       if(j==0)
       {
           printf("NO\n");
           continue;
       }
       if(j%i==0)
       {
       z=j/i;
       if( (z & -z)==z )
       printf("YES\n");
       else
       printf("NO\n");
       }
       else
        printf("NO\n");
   }
   return 0;
}

long long int gcd(long long int a,long long int b)
{
    long long int t;
    while(b)
    {
    t=b;
    b=a%b;
    a=t;
    }
    return a;
}
